title: New: Liv Dawson – Open Your Eyes
content:
Fresh from a support slot with HONNE, alongside announcing her debut headline show at OMEARA in February next year, eighteen year old Liv Dawson is quite rightly building a steady stream of plaudits. Her latest track Open Your Eyes, the final cut lifted from her debut EP, sees Disclosure’s Guy Lawrence on production duties, and is perhaps her most ‘hit-worthy’ to date, whilst still managing to keep the focus on her magnificent vocal. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
